definition: A type of headwear typically made of wool, often worn during colder seasons to keep the head warm. It is commonly used as a practical accessory in various outdoor activities and is frequently seen in winter fashion.

examples.german: Ich trage im Winter eine Wollmütze.
examples.english: I wear a woolen hat in winter.

examples.german: Die Wollmütze hält meinen Kopf warm.
examples.english: The woolen hat keeps my head warm.
He put on a woolen hat.
The woolen hat has a pompom.
